pullRequest.body:
Given functions from a family `Î´` of types into a type `Î±` whose ranges cover `Î±`, the uniform space of uniform convergence of functions from `Î±` to `Î²` is the infimum of the uniform spaces obtained as the comaps of precomposition with the maps `Î´ i â†’ Î±`, for each `i`. This gives a way to determine uniform convergence on the whole space `Î±` by considering it on the pieces `Î´ i`.

Authored-by: @ADedecker 

---

Anatole authored this and I'm just PRing it for him because he is very busy at the moment.

- [x] depends on: #13536
- [x] depends on: #13537
- [x] depends on: #13538
